name: Pong_Clone
description:
Pong - 2 paddles and a ball. Hit it past the other paddle and you score!

You've got 2 minutes to score, who will win? 

Play versus AI (that is really hard to beat) or a friend in local multiplayer.

This game was just a small learning project. There are most likely bugs, shoot me an email / dm on twitter (@cieriusgames) and I can check into it.

Design and Dev by myself (Kanin)

Music by my friend Brandon (also did the music for Avoideroids)

Thanks for checking my game out!
